sections.heading: Creation of Governor's Traffic Safety Advisory Commission as Type II Entity Within Department of State Police, Office of Highway Safety Planning; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan State Safety Commission to Governor's Traffic Safety Advisory Commission by Type III Transfer
sections.text: Creation of Governor's Traffic Safety Advisory Commission as Type II Entity Within Department of State Police, Office of Highway Safety Planning; Transfer of Powers and Duties of Michigan State Safety Commission to Governor's Traffic Safety Advisory Commission by Type III Transfer.
